Question
========

We draw a sample of n = 11 from a distribution with μ = 88 and σ^2^ = 25. Then, for the expectation and variance of the sample mean:

Answerlist
----------

* Μ = 8 and σ2 = 7.54
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 2.27
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 7.54
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 25

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Μ = 8 and σ2 = 7.54: Incorrect
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 2.27: Correct
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 7.54: Incorrect
* Μ = 88 and σ2 = 25: Incorrect
